content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking for a reasonable price. Can you tell me the lowest rent you would consider?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to get the best possible price for my apartments. However, I'm willing to negotiate a fair deal with you. What is your budget for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want the best price, and I'm here to find a fair deal as well. My budget for the rent is around 700 Euro per month, all inclusive. Is this within the range of what you're considering for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your budget of 700 Euro per month is quite low for an apartment of this size and location. However, I'm willing to work with you if you're a long-term tenant. How long do you intend to stay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking to stay in the apartment for at least two years, possibly longer depending on my studies. I'm very interested in the long-term potential of this place.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Two years is a good commitment. I appreciate long-term tenants. Since you're offering a stable lease, I'm willing to consider a lower price. How does 800 Euro per month sound to you? This includes all utilities and services.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 800 Euro per month is a bit higher than my budget, but I understand that the location and amenities are valuable. Can we discuss some potential discounts or additional benefits that could bring the price closer to my budget?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, we can discuss discounts or additional benefits. However, the rent for this apartment is already very competitive for the area. What additional benefits would you be looking for?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm open to discussing various benefits. For example, a reduced deposit, free parking, or even some help with utilities if I agree to a longer lease term. These could make the overall package more attractive to me.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: A reduced deposit and free parking are certainly possible if you agree to a two-year lease. Additionally, if you sign a two-year contract, I can offer you a special rate of 750 Euro per month, including all utilities. This is a significant discount considering the market value of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Offering a two-year lease with a reduced deposit, free parking, and a rate of 750 Euro per month, including all utilities, sounds like a very attractive package. It aligns well with my budget and needs. I'm interested in proceeding with this offer. Would you be willing to formalize this agreement?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that you find the offer attractive. To formalize the agreement, I would need you to sign a lease contract for two years, with an option to extend if both parties agree. Once the contract is signed, we can proceed with the rental process. Would you like to come to my office to sign the contract, or would you prefer to do it online?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would prefer to come to your office to sign the contract. This will allow us to discuss any final details and ensure a clear understanding of the terms. Could you provide me with your office address and a convenient time for me to visit?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, I can provide you with my office address and a convenient time for you to visit. However, before we proceed, I need to make sure that you are a trustworthy tenant. Could you please provide me with some references and proof of your income to ensure that you can afford the rent over the long term?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, I'm more than willing to provide you with references from my professors and previous landlords, as well as proof of my income from my scholarship and part-time job. This should demonstrate my trustworthiness and ability to pay the rent. I'll send these documents to you as soon as possible.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your understanding. Once I receive your references and proof of income, I will be able to finalize the lease agreement. Please send the documents to me at [insert email address]. After reviewing them, I will invite you to my office to sign the contract and provide you with the keys to the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I will prepare the documents and send them to you at [insert email address] as soon as possible. Thank you for your time and for offering me this apartment. I'm looking forward to meeting you at your office to finalize the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. Once you send the documents, I will review them and schedule a meeting with you at my office. Please keep an eye on your email for further instructions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I will do that, Mister Schmidt. Thank you again for your cooperation and for providing me with this opportunity. I'm excited to move forward with the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu. I'm glad we could come to an agreement that suits both of us. I'll be in touch soon once I've reviewed your documents. Until then, if you have any questions or need more time to gather the documents, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your flexibility and understanding. I don't have any immediate questions, but I'll reach out if anything comes up. I'll work on compiling the documents and send them to you as soon as I can. Thank you for your assistance.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu. I'm here to assist you and ensure a smooth rental process. Please take your time with the documents, and I'll be in touch once I receive them. Have a pleasant day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. You as well. I'll be in touch soon with the documents. Good day to you!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Good day to you, Haoyu. I look forward to receiving the documents from you. If you have any trouble finding them or need any assistance, don't hesitate to contact me. Goodbye for now, and I'll see you soon!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Goodbye, Mister Schmidt. I'll send the documents as soon as I can. Thank you once again for your help. See you soon!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
